head: <script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.5.0.js"></script>
<link rel="icon" href="https://di.phncdn.com/www-static/favicon.ico?cache=2022102002" type="image/x-icon">
js:
<script> $(document).ready(function(){

var quantitiy=0;
   $('.quantity-right-plus').click(function(e){
        
        // Stop acting like a button
        e.preventDefault();
        // Get the field name
        var quantity = parseInt($('#quantity').val());
        
        // If is not undefined
            
            $('#quantity').val(quantity + 1);

          
            // Increment
        
    });

     $('.quantity-left-minus').click(function(e){
        // Stop acting like a button
        e.preventDefault();
        // Get the field name
        var quantity = parseInt($('#quantity').val());
        
        // If is not undefined
      
            // Increment
            if(quantity>0){
            $('#quantity').val(quantity - 1);
            }
    });
    
});</script>
